text: I think what we see here is the greatest
fascism of our time if we can call it
fascism I feel like it's my
responsibility just as everyone else's
responsibility to stand up to this so
when the attack happened it was four
o'clock in the morning and there I
grabbed my weapon and my magazines and I
ran outside and with my friends we saw
the attackers on the other side of the
woman's building and we ran to them we
were fighting for about three hours and
two suicide bombers came one was
successful I don't know when I rip this
jacket but it was definitely that that
day because I saw it later on and it's
pretty a mess I need a new one now
someone sent me a jacket
I didn't tell my parents I was coming to
Roger I didn't tell anyone I told them I
was going through a rocky Kurdistan
which had been to the year before and
still everyone was good when I came to
Russia after some days when I decided to
stay then I realized I'm gonna have to
tell people and so I told people my
parents were were happy the I told
showed them that I was safe
they were happy because I said that I'd
found what I've been looking for for a
long time and I'm safer the problems in
the world and they were very happy when
I told them let's run when I joined the
FPGA and I told them that I joined the
we cried and then I cried and and then I
explained what is the ypj and what is
our ideology and why do we need to fight
and why do I need to join and they
understood and and said that if this is
something I believe in and I need to do
it I don't accept the government's
opinion on this to be honest I don't
really accept very much from the
government at all look what they've done
to our country nobody believes in the
government anymore nobody believes in
the political system of Britain anymore
especially working-class people we're
suffering from from every angle so when
the British government want to tell me
that I'm a terrorist or that I shouldn't
come here I don't listen I'm doing this
for humanity not for not for the
government I'm doing this for people
everywhere
